com.ciscowebex.androidsdk.auth

类 OAuthAuthenticator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ciscowebex.androidsdk.auth.OAuthAuthenticator
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Authenticator

    public class OAuthAuthenticator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Authenticator
    An OAuth based authentication strategy for authenticating a user on Cisco Webex.
    从以下版本开始:
    0.1
    另请参阅:
    Cisco Webex Integration

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明

      Creates a new OAuth authentication strategy

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法

      Authorize with the OAuth authorization code
      void deauthorize()
      Deauthorizes the current user and clears any persistent state with regards to the current user.

      Returns an access token of this authenticator.
      boolean isAuthorized()
      Returns True if the user is logically authorized.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • OAuthAuthenticator

        public OAuthAuthenticator(@NonNull
                          java.lang.String clientId,
                          @NonNull
                          java.lang.String clientSecret,
                          @NonNull
                          java.lang.String scope,
                          @NonNull
                          java.lang.String redirectUri)
        Creates a new OAuth authentication strategy
        参数:
        clientId - the OAuth client id
        clientSecret - the OAuth client secret
        scope - space-separated string representing which permissions the application needs
        redirectUri - the redirect URI that will be called when completing the authentication. This must match the redirect URI registered to your clientId.
        从以下版本开始:
        0.1
        另请参阅:
        Cisco Webex Integration

    • 方法详细资料

      • isAuthorized

        public boolean isAuthorized()
        从接口复制的说明: Authenticator
        Returns True if the user is logically authorized.

        This may not mean the user has a valid access token yet, but the authentication strategy should be able to obtain one without further user interaction.

        指定者:
        isAuthorized 在接口中 Authenticator
        返回:
        True if the user is logically authorized
        另请参阅:
        Authenticator

      • deauthorize

        public void deauthorize()
        从接口复制的说明: Authenticator
        Deauthorizes the current user and clears any persistent state with regards to the current user. If the Phone is registered, it should be deregistered before calling this method.
        指定者:
        deauthorize 在接口中 Authenticator
        另请参阅:
        Authenticator

      • authorize

        public void authorize(@NonNull
                      java.lang.String code,
                      @NonNull
                      CompletionHandler<java.lang.Void> handler)
        Authorize with the OAuth authorization code
        参数:
        code - OAuth authorization code
        handler - the completion handler will be called when authentication is complete, the error to indicate if the authentication process was successful.
        从以下版本开始:
        0.1

      • getToken

        public void getToken(@NonNull
                     CompletionHandler<java.lang.String> handler)
        从接口复制的说明: Authenticator
        Returns an access token of this authenticator.

        This may involve long-running operations such as service calls, but may also return immediately. The application should not make assumptions about how quickly this completes.

        指定者:
        getToken 在接口中 Authenticator
        参数:
        handler - a callback to be executed when completed, with the access token if successfuly retrieved, otherwise nil.
        另请参阅:
        Authenticator

      • refreshToken

        public void refreshToken(CompletionHandler<java.lang.String> handler)
        从接口复制的说明: Authenticator
        Refresh an access token of this authenticator.

        This may involve long-running operations such as service calls, but may also return immediately. The application should not make assumptions about how quickly this completes.

        指定者:
        refreshToken 在接口中 Authenticator
        参数:
        handler - a callback to be executed when completed, with the access token if successfuly retrieved, otherwise nil.
